name: R5-GuidanceResponse-R4-GuidanceResponse
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 GuidanceResponse into FHIR R4

element.display: The formal response to a guidance request

target.display: The formal response to a guidance request
target.comment: R5 `GuidanceResponse` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GuidanceResponse`
R5 `GuidanceResponse.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GuidanceResponse.contained`

R5 `GuidanceResponse.dataRequirement` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `GuidanceResponse.dataRequirement` - dataRequirement has change due to type change: R5 `dataRequirement` `DataRequirement` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `dataRequirement`

element.display: Encounter during which the response was returned

target.display: Encounter during which the response was returned
target.comment: R5 `GuidanceResponse.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GuidanceResponse.encounter`

element.display: Messages resulting from the evaluation of the artifact or artifacts

target.display: Messages resulting from the evaluation of the artifact or artifacts
target.comment: R5 `GuidanceResponse.evaluationMessage` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `GuidanceResponse.evaluationMessage` - evaluationMessage changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *)

R5 `GuidanceResponse.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `GuidanceResponse.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `GuidanceResponse.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GuidanceResponse.id`
R5 `GuidanceResponse.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GuidanceResponse.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `GuidanceResponse.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GuidanceResponse.implicitRules`
R5 `GuidanceResponse.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `GuidanceResponse.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred
R5 `GuidanceResponse.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GuidanceResponse.meta`

R5 `GuidanceResponse.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `GuidanceResponse.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `GuidanceResponse.module[x]` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `GuidanceResponse.module[x]` - module[x] removed a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/guidance-module-code
R5 `GuidanceResponse.note` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `GuidanceResponse.note` - note has change due to type change: R5 `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `note`

element.display: When the guidance response was processed

target.display: When the guidance response was processed
target.comment: R5 `GuidanceResponse.occurrenceDateTime` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GuidanceResponse.occurrenceDateTime`

element.display: The output parameters of the evaluation, if any

target.display: The output parameters of the evaluation, if any
target.comment: R5 `GuidanceResponse.outputParameters` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GuidanceResponse.outputParameters`
R5 `GuidanceResponse.performer` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GuidanceResponse.performer`

element.display: The identifier of the request associated with this response, if any

target.display: The identifier of the request associated with this response, if any
target.comment: R5 `GuidanceResponse.requestIdentifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GuidanceResponse.requestIdentifier`

R5 `GuidanceResponse.result` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `GuidanceResponse.result` - result changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1); result has change due to type change: R5 `result` `Reference` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `result`

element.display: success | data-requested | data-required | in-progress | failure | entered-in-error

target.display: success | data-requested | data-required | in-progress | failure | entered-in-error
target.comment: R5 `GuidanceResponse.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GuidanceResponse.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/guidance-response-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/guidance-response-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Patient the request was performed for

target.display: Patient the request was performed for
target.comment: R5 `GuidanceResponse.subject` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GuidanceResponse.subject`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `GuidanceResponse.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GuidanceResponse.text`
